rules: Rule1: If an outbreak of the disease is detected, then the crisis for the show is managed.
Rule2: Provided that contact tracing for the disease is conducted, testing for the disease has been implemented.
Rule3: Under the condition that an investigation is launched at the facility, an outbreak of the disease has been detected.
Rule4: If an emergency broadcast is issued for the show, then an emergency has been declared for the show.
Rule5: Monitoring is initiated for the financial product or surveillance is increased for the natural phenomenon.
Rule6: If surveillance is increased for the natural phenomenon, an emergency broadcast is issued for the show.
Rule7: Should the financial product be risk-assessed, an investigation is launched at the facility.
Rule8: Provided that a government directive is issued for the show, interagency coordination occurs at the facility.
Rule9: Whenever interagency coordination occurs at the facility, an international alert is issued for the natural phenomenon.
Rule10: If an emergency is declared for the show, then the crisis for the show is managed.
Rule11: Should an international alert be issued for the natural phenomenon, then the initiation of monitoring for the financial product leads to the financial product being risk-assessed.

Rule12: Either economic collapse occurs for the financial product or, if it is not the case that both an outbreak of the disease is not detected and an emergency is not declared for the show implies quarantine at the facility, then financial assistance is provided for the financial product.
Rule13: If market stabilization occurs for the financial product, then it is not the case that economic collapse occurs for the financial product.
Rule14: Provided that relief funding is provided for the financial product, economic collapse does not occur for the financial product.
Rule15: Either central bank intervention occurs for the financial product or insurance coverage is provided for the financial product.
Rule16: If insurance coverage is provided for the financial product, then relief funding is provided for the financial product.
Rule17: Either supply chain disruption occurs at the facility or, if central bank intervention occurs for the financial product, then market stabilization occurs for the financial product.
Rule18: Under the condition that logistics are optimized at the facility, either a distribution network is available at the facility or manufacturing has not halted at the facility.
Rule19: Should the facility be under quarantine, then the facility is under lockdown.
Rule20: If response efforts for the show are coordinated, then containment of the disease has not failed.
Rule21: In case it is not the case that an outbreak of the disease is detected or an emergency is declared for the show, medical supplies are available at the facility.
Rule22: Under the condition that it is not the case that an outbreak of the disease is detected or an emergency is declared for the show, it is not the case that the facility is under lockdown.
Rule23: If it is not the case that production resuming at the facility implies that supply chain disruption does not occur at the facility, then manufacturing has halted at the facility.
Rule24: Should it not be the case that medical supplies being available at the facility implies the facility is under lockdown, then containment of the disease has failed.

Rule25: Provided that it is not the case that the condition that an outbreak of the disease is not detected and an emergency is not declared for the show implies quarantine at the facility, financial assistance is not provided for the financial product.

Rule26: If it is not the case that the negation of the condition that an outbreak of the disease is not detected and an emergency is not declared for the show implies quarantine at the facility leads to financial assistance for the financial product, then evacuation is complete for the natural phenomenon.
Rule27: Whenever it is not the case that response efforts not being coordinated for the show implies contact tracing for the disease is conducted, a vaccine for the disease has been developed.
Rule28: Provided that response efforts for the show are not coordinated, testing for the disease has not been implemented.
facts: Fact1: A government directive has been issued for the show.
Fact2: Production has resumed at the facility.
Fact3: Logistics have been optimized at the facility.
Fact4: It is not the case that a vaccine for the disease has been developed.
Fact5: It is not the case that a distribution network is available at the facility.
Fact6: Evacuation is not complete for the natural phenomenon.

question: The crisis for the show has been managed.
